purpose: The email announces an extension of deadlines for the Call for Papers for the ICTAC 2025 conference, which will take place in Marrakech, Morocco. It provides details about the conference, including topics of interest, invited speakers, publication opportunities, and the new deadlines for abstract and full paper submissions.
evidence_sentences: The ICTAC conference series aims at bringing together researchers and practitioners from academia, industry, and government to present research and exchange ideas and experiences within theoretical aspects of computing.
Deadlines: July, 03rd: Abstracts (extended), July, 09th: Full papers (extended).
